The '''Launch Appreciation Rewards''' are a group of rewards distributed at ''[[Genshin Impact]]'s'' release for the duration of [[Version 1.0]].

Dear Travelers,

In order to thank all of our Travelers who have patiently waited and eagerly supported us during our long journey, when Genshin Impact goes live globally on September 28, we will be giving travelers 1,600 Primogems as thanks for their support. (This is additional to the 20 Acquaint Fate given for pre-registering)

To receive the preceding rewards, travelers must create an account and reach the required Adventure Rank before Version 1.1 goes live. Rewards will be delivered via in-game mail.<br>We look forward to seeing all of our Travelers in Teyvat!

==Reward List==
Rewards are delivered through in-game [[Mail]].
* Launch Appreciation Rewards (Requires [[Adventure Rank]] 7)
** {{Item|Primogem|20|x=1,600}}
* Official Website Pre-Registration Milestone Reward (Requires Adventure Rank 1)
** {{Item|Acquaint Fate|20|x=10}}
* Global Pre-Registration 10,000,000 Milestone Reward (Requires Adventure Rank 10)
** {{Item|Acquaint Fate|20|x=10}}
